ticket.title: ActiveRecord Readme correction
ticket.original-body:
The following code is in the ActiveRecord readme file:
class CommentObserver < ActiveRecord::Observer def after_create(comment) # is called just after Comment#save Notifications.deliver_new_comment("david@loudthinking.com", comment) end end
The middle line appears to use the old ActionMailer API, and should be updated to use the new ActionMailer API.
ticket.latest-body:
The following code is in the ActiveRecord readme file:
class CommentObserver < ActiveRecord::Observer def after_create(comment) # is called just after Comment#save Notifications.deliver_new_comment("david@loudthinking.com", comment) end end
The middle line appears to use the old ActionMailer API, and should be updated to use the new ActionMailer API.
ticket.original-body-html:
The following code is in the ActiveRecord readme file:

class CommentObserver < ActiveRecord::Observer
  def after_create(comment) # is called just after Comment#save
    Notifications.deliver_new_comment("david@loudthinking.com", comment)
  end
end

The middle line appears to use the old ActionMailer API, and should be updated to use the new ActionMailer API.
